Element.Name: UBL VersionID
Element.Description: Identifies the UBL version on which the transaction instance is based.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Order response identifier
Element.Description: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Order response issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Order response issue time
Element.Description: The time assigned by the buyer on which the order was issued.

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: A code that indicates whether the referenced order as whole is Accepted or Rejected or, alternatively, Accepted with change. If response code is Accept or Reject there may not be any response lines. Valid codes are: 29 (Accepted), 27 (Rejected) and 30 (Accepted with change).

Element.Name: Response clarification
Element.Description: Clarification of the suppliers decision.

Element.Name: Document currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the offer.

Element.Name: Order reference
Element.Description: Order reference information.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the order that is being responded to.

Element.Name: Seller
Element.Description: Information about Seller.

Element.Name: Seller party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service, e.g., EAN Location Number, GLN.

Attribute.Name: Code for issuer
Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Information about partyID.

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Code for issuer
Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Information about party name.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information for seller.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone name
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax name
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Information about Buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Name: Code for issuer
Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Information about partyID.

Element.Name: Buyer party identification
Element.Description: An identification for the buyer party..

Attribute.Name: Code for issuer
Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Information about party name.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who ordered the items and receives the response.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information for seller.

Element.Name: Contact ID
Element.Description: Contact identifier for buyer contact person.

Element.Name: Deliver
Element.Description: Delivery information.

Element.Name: Promised delivery period
Element.Description: Information about Promised Delivery period.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period. format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period. format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Order line
Element.Description: Order lines are only sent if Action code on header level is Accepted with change.

Element.Name: Line item
Element.Description: Line item information.

Element.Name: Document line identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the response line.

Element.Name: Response clarification
Element.Description: Clarification of the suppliers decision for the line.

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: A code that indicates whether the referenced order line as whole is Accepted or Rejected or, alternatively, Accepted with change. Valid codes are: 29 (Accepted), 27(Rejected), 30(Accepted with change).

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of items that will be delivered.

Attribute.Name: unit code
Attribute.Description: Must be a valid value in codelist UN/ECE Rec 20.

Element.Name: Delivery
Element.Description: Delivery information.

Element.Name: Promised delivery period
Element.Description: Information about Promised Delivery period.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period. format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period. format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Price
Element.Description: Price information.

Element.Name: Item price
Element.Description: The net price of an item including discounts or surcharges that apply to the price. Although price is an optional element in an offer it recommended as best practice to either state the price or provide reference to an appropriate source from which the price can be identified such as a contract, catalogue or a quote. The price amount. The net price of the item including all allowances, charges and taxes but excluding VAT.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The actual quantity to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Unit code
Attribute.Description: Must be a valid unit code according to UN/ECE Rec 20.

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: Item information.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name optionally given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description. A short name for the item.

Element.Name: Seller item identification
Element.Description: Information about Sellers ItemID.

Element.Name: Item sellers identifier
Element.Description: Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system. The sellers ID for the item

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: Information about Standard ItemID

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system. Standarized ID for the item.

Element.Name: Substituted line item
Element.Description: Information about Substituted Line item.

Element.Name: Substituted Line Item ID
Element.Description: Identifier for Seller Substituted Line Item.

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: Item information.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name optionally given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description. A short name for the item..

Element.Name: Seller item identification
Element.Description: Information about Sellers ItemID.

Element.Name: Item sellers identifier
Element.Description: Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system. The sellers ID for the item.

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: Information about Standard ItemID.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system. Standarized ID for the item.

Element.Name: Product classification
Element.Description: Information about Product Classification.

Element.Name: Item commodity classification
Element.Description: A classification code for classifying the item by its type or nature.

Element.Name: Vat category
Element.Description: Information about Vat category.

Element.Name: Item VAT category code
Element.Description: The VAT code that indicates what VAT details apply to the item.

Element.Name: Item VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT percentage rate that applies item, unless exemption reasons apply.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information about Tax scheme (VAT)

Element.Name: Tax Scheme
Element.Description: =VAT

Element.Name: Additional item property
Element.Description: Information about Additional Item properties for substitution item.

Element.Name: Property name
Element.Description: The name of the property. The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant. E.g. Size, Color, Year.

Element.Name: Property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property. E.g. XXL, Blue, 2007.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: Quantity for the property.

Attribute.Name: Unit code
Attribute.Description: Valid code according to code list UN/ECE Rec20.

Element.Name: Qualification of qty
Element.Description: Description pf quantity.

Element.Name: Order line reference
Element.Description: Information about Order Line reference.

Element.Name: Order line reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the initial order line that correspondes to the response. Each order line may only be referenced once. All order lines should be stated.
